section.title: Scope
section.para: This document provides rules for code formatting and documentation to individuals and teams contributing to M2mobi projects. Further it should be noted that this Coding Standard is a work-in-progress and will be extended over time.

section.title: Goal
section.para: Coding standards are important in any development project, but they are particularly important when many developers are working on the same project. Coding standards help ensure that the code is high quality, has fewer bugs, and can be easily maintained.
